headline: Judge to examine internal DA documents following racially charged comments by DA Todd Spitzer
author: Sean Emery
sentences: Prosecutors on Tuesday handed over to an Orange County Superior Court judge several boxes of internal communications among Orange County District Attorneyâ€™s Office leaders tied to a capital murder case that has come under scrutiny after racially charged comments made by DA Todd Spitzer during a meeting about whether to seek the death penalty.
